sentence.idiomatic: My house is very close to that supermarket.
The bookstore is not far from the school.
Is his workplace far from here?
Today she's only eating fruit, not any meals.
Just saying you won't do it is unacceptable.
Washing the dishes alone takes half an hour.
I'm cleaning the room.
He always cleans his room very well.
It's so dirty here, can you clean it?
She is in the kitchen cooking.
He has never cooked before.
I've heard that his wife cooks very delicious food.
The clothes plus the pants all together is 300 RMB.
I want a glass of cola; don't add ice.
Cooking and doing the cleaning will take at least four hours.
This clothing was made according to his height.
According to the rules, you can't go in together.
You must do it according to the client's demands.
The two of you have more or less the same taste in food.
She will make the food according to my taste.
Eating the same thing every day is so dull. You should change up your diet a bit.
I don't want to go by myself. How about we go together, shall we?
Either you go or she goes, decide for yourselves.
Then tomorrow come a little earlier, and leave a little earlier.
You must be Auntie Chen? Hello!
Hello.
Do you live far from here?
Not far, half an hour by bike.
Well, that's quite convenient. I would like it done by the hour, three times a week, each time for two hours, from 7 o'clock to 9 o'clock in the evening. Could you do that?
Yes. Do you just want cleaning done, or do you want me to cook too?
Cleaning and cooking.
Then two hours won't be enough. Your house isn't small--the cleaning will take over an hour. If you want cleaning and cooking, you had better get me for three hours.
What's the food you make like?
I can do it how you like it. Whatever you want to eat, I can make. If you want me to buy the ingredients I can do that too. Once you've finished eating, I can then wash up the dishes.
Great. How much per hour?
10 RMB.
It seems to me that around here it's usually 8 RMB.
If I come every day, it can be a little cheaper.
That would be good too. Shall we say every day you come for two hours, 8 RMB per hour. How is that?
Sure. Having someone clean every day is good--very clean!
So then let's settle on that. Auntie, can you start today?
Yes, I can.
